alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DORCHESTER COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hurlock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Dorchester County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Maryland.
